author: AAA3A
name: GuildStats
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help` to get the list of commands and their description.
short: A cog to generate images with messages and voice stats, for members, roles guilds, text channels, voice channels and activities!
description: A cog to generate images with messages and voice stats, for members, roles guilds, text channels, voice channels and activities!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
